data.title: Bharatchandra Ray - Poems - : Classic Poetry Series
data.meta_description: bharatchandra_ray_2012_10 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Bharatchandra Ray was an 18th century Bengali poet and song composer born in present-day West Bengal. He became the court poet of Maharaja Krishnachandra of Krishnanagar, composing his most famous work Annadamangal. Bharatchandra helped transition Bengali music to a more modern style and composed the first songs on the Radha-Krishna theme outside of kirtan. He is considered one of the pioneers of modern Bengali poetry and music.
